name: Artizyou for Asia
description: Artizcoin is a next-generation intellectual property (IP) utility ecosystem built to modernize how creators, innovators, scientists, programmers, and entrepreneurs certify, protect, license, and monetize their ideas in the digital age. Powered by the NFC (Non-Fungible Certificate) protocol, the project solves major problems in copyright, plagiarism, and licensingâ€”especially in an era where AI blurs authorship and traditional legal systems no longer keep up. Artizcoin provides certification, AI-powered plagiarism detection, clear licensing rights, and a global IP marketplace, enabling creators to securely authenticate and commercialize their work across multiple blockchains, starting with Solana.
